column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Amy - Thank you for your great review. I'm glad to hear we were your first exposure to authentic Japanese ramen here in Houston
column2: and we appreciate your kind words. We're especially pleased that our ramen stacks up to the ramen you had in Japan. As far as comparisons go
column3: it really doesn't get much better than that. Thank you again
column4: and we hope to serve you again soon.
